name: GMTK 2021 - Passerine
description:
CoolCats submission for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam

Theme: Joined Together

Passerine explores the ways that small, disparate beings can combine together into a larger whole -- individually, a single songbird accomplishes little, but when herded into a vast flock, they can overcome any obstacle, with the falcon and the handler working in tandem. Work as the falcon to shape and guide the flock, retrieving scattered birds and uniting them to clear a path for the wanderer below.

CoolCats Team:

  • Wafflepan
  • Panntomime
  • Hungolomghnonoloughongous

Assets Used:

  • Boids in Godot with Acceleration Structure
  • Lots of Hyptosis' tiles organized!

Controls:

"Up" / W : Fly

"Down" / S : Dive

Mouse to move

Esc to quit Alt + Enter / F11 / F : Toggle Fullscreen
